kalao.plc package¶

Submodules¶

kalao.plc.adc module¶

adc.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.plc.adc.check_error(adc_id, beck=None)¶
kalao.plc.adc.initialise(adc_id, force_init=False, beck=None, motor_nCommand=None, motor_bExecute=None)¶

Initialise the ADC motor.

Parameters:

  • motor_bExecute –

  • adc_id –

  • force_init –

  • beck – the handle for the plc connection

  • motor_nCommand – handle to send commands to the motor

Returns:

returns 0 on success and error code on failure

kalao.plc.adc.rotate(adc_id, position=0, beck=None)¶
kalao.plc.adc.send_execute(motor_bExecute)¶
kalao.plc.adc.send_init(motor_nCommand, motor_bExecute)¶
kalao.plc.adc.status(adc_id, beck=None)¶

Query the status of the ADC motor.

Returns:

complete status of calibration unit

kalao.plc.laser module¶

laser.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.plc.laser.disable(beck=None)¶

Power off laser source

Returns:

status of the laser

kalao.plc.laser.enable(beck=None)¶

Power on laser source and set to default intensity

Returns:

status of the laser

kalao.plc.laser.initialise()¶
kalao.plc.laser.lock(beck=None)¶

Lock laser into software only control

Returns:

status of the laser lock

kalao.plc.laser.set_intensity(intensity=0.4, beck=None)¶

Set light intensity of the laser source

Parameters:

intensity – light intensity to use in ?mW?

Returns:

value of the new intensity

kalao.plc.laser.status(beck=None)¶

Query the current intensity of the laser

Returns:

intensity of laser

kalao.plc.laser.switch(action_name, beck=None)¶

Enable or Disable the laser depending on action_name

Parameters:

action_name – bDisable or bEnable

Returns:

status of laser

kalao.plc.laser.unlock(beck=None)¶

Lock laser into software only control

Returns:

status of the laser lock

kalao.plc.tungsten module¶

tungsten.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.plc.tungsten.get_flat_dits()¶
kalao.plc.tungsten.get_switch_time()¶

Looks up the time when the tungsten lamp as last been put into current state (ON/OFF/ERROR)

Returns:

switch_time a datetime object

kalao.plc.tungsten.initialise(beck=None, tungsten_nCommand=None)¶

Initialise the calibration unit.

Parameters:

  • beck – the handle for the plc connection

  • tungsten_nCommand – handle to send commands to the motor

Returns:

returns 0 on success and error code on failure

kalao.plc.tungsten.off(beck=None)¶

Turn off tungsten lamp

Parameters:

beck – handle to for the beckhoff connection

Returns:

status of the lamp

kalao.plc.tungsten.on(beck=None)¶

Turn off tungsten lamp

Parameters:

beck – handle to for the beckhoff connection

Returns:

status of the lamp

kalao.plc.tungsten.send_command(beck, nCommand_value)¶

Send a command to the tungsten lamp

tungsten number commands are 1 = init 2 = OFF 3 = ON

Parameters:

  • beck – handle to the beckhoff connection

  • nCommand_value – 1, 2, or 3

Returns:

kalao.plc.tungsten.send_execute(beck)¶
kalao.plc.tungsten.status(beck=None)¶

Query the status of the tungsten lamp.

Returns:

complete status of tungsten lamp
